	let { ref = $bindable(null), ...restProps }: ComponentProps<typeof Sidebar.Root> = $props();
</script>

<Sidebar.Root bind:ref class="border-r-0" {...restProps}>

		<TeamSwitcher teams={data.teams} />
		<NavMain items={data.navMain} />
	</Sidebar.Header>
	<Sidebar.Content>
		<NavFavorites favorites={data.favorites} />
		<NavWorkspaces workspaces={data.workspaces} />
		<NavSecondary items={data.navSecondary} class="mt-auto" />
	</Sidebar.Content>
	<Sidebar.Rail />
</Sidebar.Root>

files.name: nav-actions.svelte
files.content:
Edit Oct 08
{#snippet child({ props })} {/snippet} {#each data as group, index (index)} {#each group as item, index (index)} {item.label} {/each} {/each}

files.name: nav-favorites.svelte
files.content: Favorites {#each favorites as item (item.name)} {#snippet child({ props })} {item.emoji} {item.name} {/snippet} {#snippet child({ props })} More {/snippet} Remove from Favorites Copy Link Open in New Tab Delete {/each} More

files.name: nav-main.svelte
files.content: {#each items as item (item.title)} {#snippet child({ props })} {item.title} {/snippet} {/each}

files.name: nav-secondary.svelte
files.content: {#each items as item (item.title)} {#snippet child({ props })} {item.title} {/snippet} {#if item.badge} {item.badge} {/if} {/each}

files.name: nav-workspaces.svelte
files.content: Workspaces {#each workspaces as workspace (workspace.name)} {#snippet child({ props })} {workspace.emoji} {workspace.name} {/snippet} {#snippet child({ props })} {/snippet} {#each workspace.pages as page (page.name)} {#snippet child({ props })} {page.emoji} {page.name} {/snippet} {/each} {/each} More

files.name: team-switcher.svelte
files.content:
